column1: [Charania] Suns forward Abdel Nader has been fully cleared from his April knee procedure and is expected to be available Saturday for Game 4 vs. Clippers, sources tell @TheAthletic @Stadium. Nader averaged 6.7 points and 41.9 percent from 3-point range this season.
[Charania] Suns free agent Abdel Nader has agreed to a two-year, $4.2 million deal to return to Phoenix, his agent Cervando Tejeda tells @TheAthletic @Stadium.
